Item.name: Fractal Access Device
Item.description: An object found on fractals that functions as an ID card... somehow.

Item.name: Name Hider
Item.description: An ID card specifically designed to spoof IFF and hide the wearer's identity when combined with a mask. No special access.

Item.name: Peacekeeper ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a peacekeeper.

Item.name: Marine ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a marine.

Item.name: Subjugator ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a subjugator.

Item.name: Cleaner ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a cleaner.

Item.name: Kromer ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a Kromer.

Item.name: Inquisitor ID Card
Item.description: Identification for an Inquisitor.

Item.name: Rabbit ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a rabbit.

Item.name: Vent Dweller ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a vent dweller.

Item.name: Assistant ID Card
Item.description: Identification for an assistant.

Item.name: Engineer ID Card
Item.description: Identification for an engineer.

Item.name: Mechanic ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a mechanic.

Item.name: Medical ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a medical doctor.

Item.name: Security ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a Security Guard.

Item.name: Captain ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a Captain.

Item.name: Coalition ID Card (Basic)
Item.description: Identification for a Coalition recruit.

Item.name: Coalition ID Card (Standard)
Item.description: Identification for a Coalition soldier.

Item.name: Coalition ID Card (Elite)
Item.description: Identification for a Coalition elite.

Item.name: Coalition ID Card (Captain)
Item.description: Identification for a Coalition captain.

Item.name: Jovian ID Card (Basic)
Item.description: Identification for a Jovian recruit.

Item.name: Jovian ID Card (Standard)
Item.description: Identification for a Jovian soldier.

Item.name: Jovian ID Card (Elite)
Item.description: Identification for a Jovian elite.

Item.name: Jovian ID Card (Captain)
Item.description: Identification for a Jovian captain.

Item.name: Coalition Loyalty Grenade
Item.description: Sets the team of everyone in its AOE to Coalition.

Item.name: Jovian Loyalty Grenade
Item.description: Sets the team of everyone in its AOE to Jovian.

Item.name: Coalition Passport
Item.description: An ID card with the identifying information replaced with more personal information, used for crossing borders and the like. Cannot open doors. A sonar beacon can be placed inside to track the wearer's movements.

Item.name: Phoenix Access Device
Item.description: An object found on fractals that functions as an ID card... somehow.

Item.name: Guardian Omnitool
Item.description: Guardians use extremely unusual tools for maintaining the ruins, including a plasma-based cutter, far stronger than the coalition plasma cutter.

Item.name: Control Monitor
Item.description: Connect to a camera or turret.

Item.name: Long Range Wifi Component
Item.description: An extra long-range Wifi Component for distant connections.

Item.name: Carry Booster
Item.description: A potent drug that permanently improves the parts of the subject's body associated with carrying, such as musculature and joints, permitting faster carrying speeds. As a side effect, improves burn resistance.

Item.name: EXP Booster
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Fanatic Booster
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Captain Identifier
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Elite Identifier
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Standard Identifier
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Basic Identifier
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: Nitrogen Tank
Item.description: A tank used to contain nitrogen gas. Refill in an oxygen generator.

Item.name: Folder
Item.description: A folder intended to hold different documents.

Item.name: Guide to Europan Law, Page 1
Item.description: Violent Crimes and the punishments thereof.

Item.name: Guide to Europan Law, Page 2
Item.description: Trespassing and the punishments thereof.

Item.name: Guide to Europan Law, Page 3
Item.description: Miscellaneous crimes and the punishments thereof.

Item.name: Guide to Europan Law, Page 4
Item.description: Modifiers that may adjust the sentencing of a crime.

Item.name: Blank Page
Item.description: A paper which can be written on. You can fit about 26 lines on this.

Item.name: Cursed Fentanyl Placeholder
Item.description: Deconstruct this to obtain Cursed Fentanyl.

Item.name: Magic Blood Pack Placeholder
Item.description: Deconstruct this to obtain a Magic Blood Pack.

Item.name: Enchanted Fiber
Item.description: This spool of enchanted organic fiber has much more potential than its regular form.

Item.name: Metal Crate?
Item.description: A metal crate with padding inside, allowing a human to fit safely within.

Item.name: Reinforced Duffel Bag
Item.description: A duffel bag that will not deteriorate and fits inside crate racks.

Item.name: Reinforced Duffel Bag?
Item.description: A duffel bag that will not deteriorate and fits inside crate racks.

Item.name: Bike Horn?
Item.description: An object resembling a bike horn that appears to emit random noises when the ball is compressed. Just holding it gives you a terrible feeling.

Item.name: Mineral Scrap Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random mineral resources.

Item.name: Large Mineral Scrap Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 8 random mineral resources. Small chance for alien resources.

Item.name: Ore Scrap Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 3 random ores.

Item.name: Large Ore Scrap Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 6 random ores.

Item.name: Organic Trash Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random organic resources.

Item.name: Medical Trash Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 8 random medical and organic resources.

Item.name: Tool Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain tools.

Item.name: Surplus Clothing Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random clothing items.

Item.name: Surplus Weapons Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 5 random weapons.

Item.name: Surplus Ammo Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random bits of ammunition.

Item.name: Coalition Surplus Weapons Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random weapons.

Item.name: Coalition SMG Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Standard SMG and 2 SMG magazines.

Item.name: Coalition Heavy SMG Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Heavy SMG and 2 armour-piercing magazines.

Item.name: Coalition SMG Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random weapons.

Item.name: Coalition Shotgun Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Coalition pump-action shotgun.

Item.name: Coalition Shotgun Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire shotgun rounds.

Item.name: Coalition Revolver Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Service Revolver.

Item.name: Coalition Revolver Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire 12 revolver rounds.

Item.name: Coalition Surplus Ammo Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random bits of ammunition. Output is more focused on weapons that Security is likely to use.

Item.name: Coalition Surplus Clothing Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random clothing items.

Item.name: Renegade SMG Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Standard SMG and 2 SMG magazines.

Item.name: Renegade Heavy SMG Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Heavy SMG and 2 armour-piercing magazines.

Item.name: Renegade SMG Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random weapons.

Item.name: Renegade Shotgun Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Coalition pump-action shotgun.

Item.name: Renegade Shotgun Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire shotgun rounds.

Item.name: Renegade Revolver Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire a Service Revolver.

Item.name: Renegade Revolver Ammo Requisition
Item.description: Deconstruct this to acquire 12 revolver rounds.

Item.name: Renegade Surplus Clothing Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random clothing items. Renegade outfits only.

Item.name: Renegade Surplus Weapons Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random weapons. Renegade weapons only.

Item.name: Renegade Surplus Ammo Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct this to gain 4 random bits of ammunition. Non-Renegade ammunition types have been removed.

Item.name: Patrol Cap
Item.description: For when wearing a helmet is updressing the job.

Item.name: Levergun
Item.description: A rifle retrofitted to chamber the far more common ammunition of revolvers.

Item.name: Captain's Carapace
Item.description: A light chest plate worn by the Coalition's finest and only the Coalition's finest. Degrades into nothing after death.

Item.name: Captain's Autoinjector Headset
Item.description: An advanced long range radio with an Auto-Injector that crumbles upon death.

Item.name: Admiral's Hat
Item.description: The hat worn by every Coalition admiral. Taking it off would be treason.

Item.name: Admiral's Uniform
Item.description: The uniform worn by every Coalition admiral. Taking it off would be treason.

Item.name: Strongman's Hat
Item.description: The hat worn by every Coalition strongman. Taking it off would be treason.

Item.name: Strongman's Uniform
Item.description: The uniform worn by every Coalition strongman. Taking it off would be treason.

Item.name: Renegade Sponsorship Crate
Item.description: Deconstruct to receive your seperatist funding.

Item.name: Blackglove Booster
Item.description: A potent drug that permanently improves the parts of the subject's body associated with carrying, such as musculature and joints, permitting faster carrying speeds. As a side effect, improves burn resistance.

Cum.name: Jesus' Cum Jar
Cum.description: What the fuck is this? Maybe it'll bring you closer to god, perhaps literally, as the label on it is very clear ''DO NOT CONSUME UNDER AND CIRCUMSTANCE!!! RESEARCH PURPOSES ONLY!!!''

Anticum.name: Cum Antidote
Anticum.description: neutralizes the sperm cells within an organisms blood stream.. (cures cum ingestion)

Saline.name: Peterblood Bag
Saline.description: Harvested from the blood of the original Jerrector and genetically altered, this substance is often used to stop both bleeding and blood loss. Just be aware of the chemical aftertaste.
